page.title: 20The Ringstead Railway.
page.content: The older people remember going on the train for their holidays or on special excursions to the sea-side.They used the train to go shopping,to go to the pictures and some went to school in Wellingborough by train each day.It took football supporters to Northampton,the return ticket was 9d (4p).The trains also carried coal and limestone to the steel works. In 1930 the whole station was burnt down,but was rebuilt later.The Royal Family used to come through Ringstead on their way to Barnwell. Unfortunately the line was closed in 1965.
